thread.section_title: Hotel 41 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A little bit of Heaven on Earth
thread.title_full: A little bit of Heaven on Earth - Review of Hotel 41, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mick T
title: A little bit of Heaven on Earth
text: Just returned from our first visit to the hotel and it was an amazing stay, celebrating my wife's birthday. The special touches made the occasion all the more memorable. It certainly lives up to its reputation. Cannot wait to go back. The Plunder the Pantry is one of the highlights. The service is superb and you are treated as a special guest from the moment you enter the hotel. It is obvious why it has earned all its awards including the recent Forbes 5 Star. The hotel and all the staff deserve such recognition.
